Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4968 affecting package netplan for versions less than 1.0.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-4968 affecting package netplan for versions less than 1.0.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package netplan is earlier than 1.0.1-1, affected by CVE-2022-4968
